def get_comments(issue_number): '''è·å– issue çš„è¯„è®º''' url = f'https://api.github.com/repos/{REPO_OWNER}/{ISSUES_REPO_NAME}/issues/{issue_number}/comments' headers = { 'Authorization': f'token {GITHUB_TOKEN}', 'Accept': 'application/vnd.github.v3+json' } response = requests.get(url, headers=headers) response.raise_for_status() return response.json()
